alert.note: Alert for Southern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 12:28AM MST until December 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional accumulation of an inch or less. Winds gusting 20 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Snow, winds gusting to 35 mph, blowing snow reducing visibility to around a mile at times, and significant drifting of snow, will make travel and outdoor activities very difficult. Rural roads may drift shut making travel impossible. Travel is discouraged.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slick and snow covered roads along with poor visibility and drifting snow. Delay travel if you can. If you must travel slow down and use caution while traveling and have a winter survival kit in the car in case you become stranded. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
